java/liquibase/preconditions/SqlPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00006 
00007 import java.sql.ResultSet;
00008 import java.sql.SQLException;
00009 import java.sql.Statement;
00010 
00011 public class SqlPrecondition implements Precondition {
00012 
00013     private String expectedResult;
00014     private String sql;
00015 
00016 
00017     public String getExpectedResult() {
00018         return expectedResult;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public void setExpectedResult(String expectedResult) {
00022         this.expectedResult = expectedResult;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getSql() {
00026         return sql;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public void setSql(String sql) {
00030         this.sql = sql;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException {
00034         Statement statement = null;
00035         ResultSet resultSet = null;
00036         try {
00037             statement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00038             resultSet = statement.executeQuery(getSql());
00039             if (!resultSet.next()) {
00040                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("No rows returned from SQL Precondition", changeLog, this);
00041             }
00042             String returnString = resultSet.getString(1);
00043             if (resultSet.next()) {
00044                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("Too Many rows returned from SQL Precondition", changeLog, this);
00045             }
00046 
00047             if (!expectedResult.equals(returnString)) {
00048                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("SQL Precondition failed.  Expected '"+expectedResult+"' got '"+returnString+"'", changeLog, this);
00049             }
00050 
00051         } catch (SQLException e) {
00052             throw new PreconditionFailedException("Error executing SQL precondition: "+e.getMessage(), changeLog, this);
00053         } finally {
00054             try {
00055                 if (resultSet != null) {
00056                     resultSet.close();
00057                 }
00058             } catch (SQLException e) {
00059                 ;
00060             }
00061             try {
00062                 if (statement != null) {
00063                     statement.close();
00064                 }
00065             } catch (SQLException e) {
00066                 ;
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070 
00071     public String getTagName() {
00072         return "sqlCheck";
00073     }
00074 }
